text: ara he amara sampradaya! Era binimaye ami tomadera kache dhanadaulata ca'i na. Amara sramaphala kebala allahâ€Œra kache'i rayeche, ara yara bisbasa kareche tadera ami tariye'o debara na'i. Nihsandeha tadera prabhura kache tara mulakata karate yacche, kintu ami tomadera dekhachi ekati ajnanatakusala sampradaya.
